title: The ‘Station Eleven’ Season Finale With Showrunner Patrick Somerville
description:
Chris and Andy are joined by ‘Station Eleven’ showrunner Patrick Somerville to talk about the finale and season as a whole. They talk about how he came to the project (2:35), the emotions of the season finale (19:34), and why this was one of the hardest projects he has ever taken on (46:16).

Hosts: Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald
Guest: Patrick Somerville
Producer: Kaya McMullen
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
